description: The native medium of software designs is code.

activities.name: More Visualization Techniques
activities.instructor_notes: maybe break them up like the book does.
activities.description: We will go through a few more techniques.

activities.name: Design a visualization
activities.description: In your groups, design a visualization. Think about what techniques you might want to use and decide which is the most appropriate for the dataset.

assignments.description: Continue working on your visualization. Get some of it into pixels or code (depending on how complex it is).
